name: AccessKey
description: The AWS::IAM::AccessKey resource type generates a secret access key and assigns it to an IAM user or AWS account.

properties.name: Serial
properties.description: This value is specific to AWS CloudFormation and can only be incremented. Incrementing this value notifies AWS CloudFormation that you want to rotate your access key. When you update your stack, AWS CloudFormation will replace the existing access key with a new key.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the access key. By default, AWS CloudFormation sets this property value to Active.

properties.name: UserName
properties.description: The name of the user that the new key will belong to.

attributes.name: SecretAccessKey
attributes.description: Returns the secret access key for the specified AWS::IAM::AccessKey resource. For example: wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYzEXAMPLEKEY.
